content: पुरा {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} In former times, formerly, of yore, in the olden time; पुरा शक्रमुपस्थाय <ls>R. 1. 75</ls>; पुरा सरसि मानसे… यस्य यातं वयः <ls>Bv. 1. 3</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 119</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">5. 22.</ls> {@--2@} Before, hitherto, upto the present time. {@--3@} At first, in the first place. {@--4@} In a short time, soon, ere-long, shortly (in this sense usually with a present tense to which it gives a future sense); पुरा सप्तद्वीपां जयति वसुधामप्रतिरथः <ls>Ś. 7. 33</ls>; पुरा दूपयति स्थलीं <ls n="R.">12. 30</ls>; आलोके ते निपतति पुरा सा बलिव्यांकुलां वा <ls>Me. 85</ls>; <ls>N. 1. 18</ls>; <ls>Śi. 10. 56</ls>; <ls>Ki. 10. 50</ls>; <ls n="Ki.">11. 36.</ls> {@--5@} <ab>Ved.</ab> For the defence of {@--6@} Securely from. {@--7@} Except, besides.
पुरा {@--1@} An epithet of the Ganges. {@--2@} A kind of perfume. {@--3@} The east. {@--4@} A castle.
